title: Vivian

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Shade Fist**: Punch an enemy, if they survive, they will burn the next round, which will deal a Powerful attack.
- **Veil** (2x): Pick someone, you will learn the names of all their visitors, and attacking actions will fail on them.
- **Infatuate** (2x): Confuse someone, they will be redirected to a neighbor of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You are immune to attacks and negative effects from players you targeted previously, but it only activates once for each player.

desc:
Post 3043
*That's Vivian, She's the youngest of the three Shadow Sirens.*
